title: Can't remember password and defunct email address

posts.content:
I can log on with my old computer cos it has remembered my password, but unfortunately I can't. I could change it if I had an email account but orange have defunct my old email address. I could change my email address if I could remember my password.
Can't remember my password and email doesn't work, what do I do?
Cheers Jon

PM me your new email address and I will change that and your password for you

Cheers
paul
